DOC.brief_summary: To determine compare effect train program Pilates Facilitation Neuromuscular Proprioceptive balance function elderly woman .
DOC.brief_title: Exercise Protocols Postural Balance Of Elderly Women
DOC.detailed_description: Older woman live Teresina participate local church project call `` PÃ£o do Pobres '' randomly divide three group : Proprioceptive Neuromuscular Facilitation ( PNFG ) , Pilates ( PG ) Control ( CG ) . Intervention : A training program ( 50 minute session ) perform PNFG PG , 3 time week , 4 week . The elderly CG suffer intervention continue daily activity . Main Outcome Measures : The stabilometric parameter , Berg Balance Scale score , functional reach test Timed Up Go test ( TUG test ) measure one month , participant .
DOC.criteria: All subject 60 80 year old , sedentary healthy Orthopedic , cardiovascular , vestibular , psychological , neurological impairment would allow execution study task
